name: CivilBook
description:
One day in 2069, the gravity of the earth began to weaken, and one powerful state built a gravity apparatus that employs 90% of the population. YOU are the president of this state, and you have been informed that in 40 days the spacecraft will be ready to fly to Mars. You can make decisions using the generated cards, all your decisions affect the indicators of the state, and thus you control gravity by making various decisions.

The game was made for Mini Jam 107
